author: sabob
msg: Added first class support for HTML Headers. CLK-501

author: dkulp
msg: Add ability to turn off the policy engine (since it now defaults to on)

author: eyang
msg: HADOOP-5387. Collect number of disk read/write operation for system metrics.

author: lryan
msg: Move image reading to optimizing class associated with image type.
Clarify failure mode for reading ICC profiles from JPEG's. Dont rely on Sanselan brittle exception for this case.
